624360.name: My own little planet - Official Soundtrack
624360.description:
Original Soundtrack composed by Bettina Calmon for the indie game "My own little planet".
The soundtrack includes 13 heart-warming musics that you will spend the eternity listening! Plus a special art of the soundtrack cover!

Soundtrack list :

1- My own little planet
2- Simple things
3- Dark Boy
4- Fear in a jar
5- Life to ruin
6- Mr.Pincher's chase
7- Buried heart
8- Doppelganger
9- Lost inside
10- The Freakshow
11- As i told you
12- Forgive me father
13- But i have to kill you
624360.supported_languages:
英语*
*具有完全音频支持的语言
